summary: A guide to building a research agent with planning, file tools, and subagents, covering setup, execution, and next steps.

structure.title: Quickstart
structure.summary: A guide to building a research agent with planning, file tools, and subagents, covering setup, execution, and next steps.

nodes.title: Prerequisites
nodes.summary: Prerequisites for using DeepAgents, including API key setup, dependency installation, and initial agent configuration.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > Prerequisites > Step 1: Install dependencies
nodes.title: Step 1: Install dependencies
nodes.summary: Install DeepAgents and Tavily Python dependencies using pip, uv, or Poetry.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > Prerequisites > Step 2: Set up your API keys
nodes.title: Step 2: Set up your API keys
nodes.summary: Instructions for setting up API keys for Anthropic and Tavily services.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > Prerequisites > Step 3: Create a search tool
nodes.title: Step 3: Create a search tool
nodes.summary: Demonstrates creating a search tool using the Tavily API for internet searches within a DeepAgents framework.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > Prerequisites > Step 4: Create a deep agent
nodes.title: Step 4: Create a deep agent
nodes.summary: Create a deep agent with a system prompt for expert research and internet search tool.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > Prerequisites > Step 5: Run the agent
nodes.title: Step 5: Run the agent
nodes.summary: Demonstrates how to execute an agent by invoking it with a user query and printing the response.

nodes.title: What happened?
nodes.summary: Describes the automated steps a deep agent takes to complete a research task, including planning, research, context management, subagent delegation, and report synthesis.

nodes.title: Next steps
nodes.summary: Guidance for further development after building a deep agent, covering customization, middleware, memory, and deployment.
